Hey Beale, loving the new update btw. However your craft files don't seem to be working for me. They don't come up in my VAB, I've tried placing them in my saves craft files and the stock files but neither worked. Please help!

Hey Beale, loving the new update btw. However your craft files don't seem to be working for me. They don't come up in my VAB, I've tried placing them in my saves craft files and the stock files but neither worked. Please help!

Hi, and thanks!

This is a really strange issue. Few possibilities.

1. Are you in career mode? You must tick the "Allow stock crafts" in the cheat menu.

2. Is the file placement correct, here is mine.

Hope this helps
Yes they are in that file and I don't use career. Not working

Yes they are in that file and I don't use career. Not working

My Mir with the tantares parts (and also mech jeb parts) and a fully stock Mir. I just need to work on the antena on the Priroda tantares model.

Tantares parts Mir

Stock Parts Mir

Who's the best???
tantares mir hands down.

Status on Progress (no not that one)

Aside from Kvant and other Mir parts, I'm going to hold off any further development until 0.25 is released.

I hope to release a small update in the meantime with Kvant IVA, Priorda Dish(Maybe) and new colour schemes.

Why?

Because as I understand it, 0.25 is going to see upwards of 80 stock parts get a makeover. Slightly changing what "Stock" is.

Obviously for a Stockalike mod, this is a big thing.

Hope people understand

Progress in Green

Kvant IVA

Status on Progress (no not that one)

Aside from Kvant and other Mir parts, I'm going to hold off any further development until 0.25 is released.

I hope to release a small update in the meantime with Kvant IVA, Priorda Dish(Maybe) and new colour schemes.

I love the new engine! It works and looks such awesome. Just one small question - is it intentionally lacking emissive texture?

Also it's great to have new docking port. I had hoped that you will create it.

I'm not sure if someone had pointed it out earlier but I noticed that IVA on V-C1 Operations Block is rotated by 90 degrees. Nothing significant but I thought that you may want to know about this.

I love the new engine! It works and looks such awesome. Just one small question - is it intentionally lacking emissive texture?

Also it's great to have new docking port. I had hoped that you will create it.

About the emissive texture, it was an oversight and will be included next release.
